original_title: Black Veil Brides- Alive and Burning
overview: Alive and Burning is Black Veil Brides's first live DVD which was released on July 10, 2015.[1] It features footage from the sold-out show at the Wiltern Theater on November 1, 2014 as part of the Black Mass tour.
title: Black Veil Brides- Alive and Burning
